website_summaries.verdict: All the qualities that matter most when storing tires: stability, versatility, and practicality. You won't find a better tire rack on today's market.
pros: Rugged steel structure holds up to 400 pounds
cons: A costly model that's not foldable, but it is sturdier than some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design. It held tires just fine
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design. It held tires just fine, but once I put a complete set of tires and wheels, it failed. The way the cross members join with concentric tubes is the weak point. Once loaded with a 220 pound set, the conjoined metal tubes just sagged and decoupled, dropping everything to the ground. So glad the neither my car or kids were underneath it when it failed. This product can cause serious injury of even death.
customer_reviews.author: marv

customer_reviews.title: Great product but one problem.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good. It's really sturdy and well built and easy as pie to install. One problem. The packaging is terrible and was falling apart and opened on my porch. I have seen other complaints about this and I'm lucky nothing was missing during shipping. The manufacturer needs to fix this. Simply a bigger box and better packaging would do it.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN GARLAND

customer_reviews.title: Qyality an nuce looking at great price
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper options but after checking reviews and designs vs price this looked like a great choice. After getting it and laying out, measuring, I realized it would fit above garage door. Studs oddly spaced so on one end had to drI'll the plate as per directions. I hand tighten last bit of lag bolts as you can strip out with air wrench. The width is totally enough for my Subaru Outback wheels. I was still getting tires but have picture of tack. I have a welder but this was so low priced and good looking making one made no sense.
customer_reviews.author: Dirkdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Needs 2x4 to help hold up weight
customer_reviews.text: I have this attached to my shed against 2x4. Thats alot of weight load bearing on my wall. The rack can handle 400 lbs but can a 2x4 studded wall not fall inward. So on outside corners I cut 2x4 to help support it. Feel more comfortable about the weight issue. I added those brackets to help support the wall.
customer_reviews.author: kevin h

customer_reviews.title: Great Rack and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This tire rack is definitely more solid than other rack that don't distribute their weight/load over 4 studs, however this means the size it comes will be much bigger in your garage, it does sticks out much more than other 2 post style. My 4 255/40/19 fits there perfectly without hitting the back wall even when the third tube was not install alone the 2 L-mounting post. Negative: Package came with missing third chrome tube, had to call amazon to send a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: LyftMaster

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rack- Hard Install
customer_reviews.text: The rack itself is great and exactly as advertised. I have 4 large SUV rims with tires and they fit easily. But the instructions say 30 minutes for install, but it took me more like 3 hours. Part of the problem is that the studs in my garage were not the standard 16 inches, so I had to work around that issue. But even absent that issue, 30 minutes to install is never going to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job
customer_reviews.text: This puppy took about 30 mins to setup and install. My only grievance is having the top main rail so long. The top rail comes in two pieces but the width of my tires only required just a couple inches longer than one rail piece... So I just threw up both. Not too bad though as I can likely hang some other things on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Howes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tire Storage
customer_reviews.text: Rack is easily expandable to hold wide tires. I stored my race tires on this rack. Two 315/30/18 tires mounted on 18x11 wheels and two 345/35/18 tires mounted on 18x13 wheels. 315 tires are 25.6 inches in diameter and the 345 tires are 26.8 inches in diameter. Total weight comes to about 240 lbs. The concentric ring cross tubes hold the weight fine. Yes, they do droop a slight amount but that is the nature of the beast. If you don't expand the rack out to the very outside edge of the mounting rail the concentric tubes have enough cross section to hold the weight without failing.
customer_reviews.author: BillD64

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack! Easy to install with the right tools
customer_reviews.text: Nice rack! Easy to install with the right tools, well finished, and extremely sturdy. I drilled guide holes and used an impact driver for the installation which took under an hour. As mentioned in another review, be sure to measure how wide your tires will be and make adjustments before placing them on the rack. Even with a large set of tires (295/40-21) I had about 10" of width to spare when set to the widest point.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine. Holds a max of 400 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Very solid. I have 4 16" tires and they fit with plenty of room to spare. There was a question I had installing it. The directions state the wider "lip" should be on top when mounting the main rail but I found both lips to be the same so I just mounted it with the logo facing up. Seems fine. Holds a max of 400 lbs. but my tires probably weigh about 200lbs. I am 6' and 230 lbs and I can hang from it... solid. The instructions say 30 minute installation... schedule 2 hours! It's also a little pricey but overall I woud buy it again (and will when the wife says she wants snow tire too!).
customer_reviews.author: Russell B. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: I took my time and carefully installed these exactly per the directions and the results were great after a 2 hour installation. These are well made and nicely finished and I was impressed with the quality. They are worth the money and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ohmy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Packaging and shipment can use major improvement but nothing damaged. Goes up well and looks great. Very sturdy. I bout two sets. One fore Jeep tires and the other for truck tires. They fit their great and looks clean in a finished garage.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of these at one time. They arrived about 5 days apart but still within the expected delivery date. One box arrived previously opened, taped closed and damaged, the other in perfect condition. We mounted them recently after some much needed spring cleaning in our garage. First rack went up perfectly, second one not so much. Turned out we were missing parts and some of the pieces we had we wielded incorrectly and the threads of the bolts couldn't go in the proper way. What do I do about these missing and useless parts?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: the box showed up extremely damaged. The contents were zip tied together inside the box, but the pieces were scratched up. Didn't necessarily care about the scratches because it is a tire rack after all. Functions as it should, the ability to adjust for sizes is nice, but not necessary, as long as you know what the largest size tires you will be storing. I'm not sure if I would buy them again, due to the price, but they look nice on the wall and it does the job its supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Earl L.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and fairly easy to install
customer_reviews.text: When I received the box it was pretty ripped up but all the pieces were zip tied together so nothing had been lost in transit. The install is fairly straight forward but an extra set of hands would make it go smoother. It holds the wheels & tires for my Mustang without problem and looks good in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Denchel

customer_reviews.title: Great tire storage option.
customer_reviews.text: This tire storage rack is an A+. It is solid and holds the weight easily. I was able to install it in my shed with ease on 16" on center studs. The holes lined up without issue and the hardware was easy to use. I currently have 5 tires on here, weighing a total of 320lbs, and this has no issue holding the weight. Appropriately installed with all of the bolts centered on the studs, this rack is solid....a great buy. I could easily get a 6th tire on there if I needed.....the current ones I have on there are 245's. Great product. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: watch me

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: The box was totally demolished. Luckily the contents are zipped tied together except the piping. I was fortunate to not have lost any parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boxes smashed, parts missing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assembly and they seem strong, however.... I bought three units and I can only assemble two. One box was completely intact with two of the cross bars missing (they slid out of a small hole in the box). One box was smashed, but the parts were all present and there was no damage. The final unit had a smashed box and three of the six cross bars were missing. Waiting to get all the parts to complete assembly and mount.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Maulbeck

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging but a very solid product.
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived it was so beat up that I expected to have to return it. It was shipped in the retail with some packing tape, no shipping box. When I opened it, to my surprise, the rack was in perfect condition as it was bubble wrapped. The rack is top quality, the mounting bars are nicely painted in Michelin blue and the cross bars are nicely chromed. It is very solid, looks good and installed very easily. I'm very happy that I did not cheap out on this.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk Eye

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 2 years and it still does its job just fine. Assembly was easy. The hardest thing was installing the lag bolts into the studs, but thats necessary in order to securely support the weight. The fit/finish is good and the corners of the rack are not as sharp as they appear. This is a big deal since I have a small garage with low ceilings, so I've bumped into it a few times. Adjusting the rails is a big tedious, but you only have to do it once, so no real complaints there. When I purchased mine it was quite a bit cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This rack is exactly what we needed, heavy duty and looks great. Fast shipping though box was badly damaged. One minor part was missing but replacement was sent to us after a phone call. Worth the extra money to get the heavier duty over the standard racks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rack em up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to bolt up with the lab bolts that came with the product. Holding my race wheels and tires just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Tom G

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the HyLoft 1000 Tire Rack
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the HyLoft 1000 Tire Rack. I am storing four 305 section width tires on wheels and there is room to spare. Installation was an easy 20-30 minute job with the most time consuming part unwrapping the product and then finding the studs beneath the plaster (yes plaster) garage wall. Just ordered my second one to install inline with the first.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, well built, looks great and quite adjustable. I store motorcycle tires on it from 21" to 12". Gets tires up and out of the way to free up garage space.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Tire Rack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack to hold my winter tires for my 1997 BMW M3. The rack came with all the parts that I needed to install it. I marked a spot on the wall, found where my studs were located, grabbed my level and my DeWalt drill and set off. The installation was quick and easy and I had the entire rack up in about 30 minutes. The rack is easily adjustable to hold 4 tires of virtually any size. It had no trouble supporting the average size snow tires I put up on it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Miller

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great.
customer_reviews.text: This rack is a nice sturdy piece. Holds my tires well. The only issue that I have is that even with the 10 foot ceilings in my garage and the rack mounted within 2 inches of that, the (relatively sharp) bottom corner is right about eye level for me at 6'4" making for a potentially dangerous situation depending on mounting location. I wish this corner didn't come to such a sharp point but I like the rack and have put some yellow and black caution tape on the corner to remind myself to steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works as designed, length is variable, which I needed. Install very straight forward, only catch, wall studs must be exactly 18 inches apart.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: You could build something functional out of wood for less but this is finished and quick to put up. I was able to get 6 215 car tires on one rack with some room to spare. I bought a second one to get the last two tires and some motorcycle tires up and out of the way. Based on another review I didn't put the top rail all the way up to the ceiling, I think this is only an issue if you are storing truck/suv tires. If your tires are shorter than the end pieces you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Perez

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as it was suppose to be heavy duty. Opened it up and found 2 of the 3 end caps to the horizontal bars broken off. The 3rd one is cracked and ready to fall off. One wasn’t even in the poorly packaged box. The quality guy must have taken the day off, and the blind guy must have been welding. This is heavy duty? Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The rack is easy to adjust when there aren't any tires on it
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. The rack is easy to adjust when there aren't any tires on it, easily held my wheels and tires for the Honda Ridgeline. I did manage to bust the head off one of the mounting bolts, so you may want to make sure you have a couple spare just in case.
customer_reviews.author: C Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Tire Rack.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Works just as described and arrived in a perfectly wrapped box with no damage. Very strong and durable. Storing four passenger tires with rims and they fit easily. Follow instructions for bracing. Nice and smooth installation. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect AND beautiful finished look! Solid reliable product.
customer_reviews.text: VERY sturdy. Holds small and large tires. Must be mounted into studs.
customer_reviews.author: YZ250 owner

customer_reviews.title: Solid tire storage
customer_reviews.text: Tire Rack stores your extra tires off the floor and out of the way. It's well made, sturdy and adjusts to various tire widths (antique, snow, racing). One gripe, installation was an easy one man job except they need more holes to add flexibility for connection to the wall studs. It should have holes every 4 or 8 inches, not just every 16 inches. In tight spaces you may not be able to align the tire rack to your studs. I had to mount a 2x6 on the wall and hang the tire rack from the 2x6. Otherwise, a 5* product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction
customer_reviews.text: The Hyloft tire rack has solid construction and fairly easy to install. Take note that the primary horizontal support bar needs 5 studs (total 80 inches across) to fasten to. That's the hardest part. After that, everything gets put together with ease. Everything is adjustable to accommodate most tire sizes. I am very pleased with this purchase. The rack allowed me to get snow tires for my cars this year which was not possible previously since I had no where to store tires in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver for storing tires overhead.
customer_reviews.text: This rack is a massive space saver. This took all four of my Honda Odyssey snow tires and rims, with no problem and lots of room left over. Rack looks and feels high quality and comes with very secure mounting instructions. I was able to line up all the holes onto my house's studs for a very secure mounting. I only wish I had bought one of these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Pieces missing from the package
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived without the 3 Telescoping chrome tubes that hold the tires in place.
customer_reviews.author: Peter E. Stack

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. I anchored it into a concrete block wall with Tapcon screws. It has been holding about 200lbs of tires for the last 6 months without issue.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good tire rack
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty tire rack. Even so, it was pretty easy to install. Keeps my alternate season tires/rims up off the garage floor way they take up way too much valuable space. Made the garage look my more organized. Combined with Tire totes, it looks pretty good. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that one of the bolts was difficult to turn
customer_reviews.author: B Dubs

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is fine but packaging is awful as they use cheap boxing and parts fall out of them. You’ll be lucky if it gets there with everything in the box.
customer_reviews.author: bygblok

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable, versitile, and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Interlocking wall mounting brackets allow this product to be daisy-chained and adjusted to satisfy the needs of any user. I easilly installed two of these racks end to end and adjusted one side to store four pre-mounted Mustang GT tires and rims, and the other side to store 6 smaller 13 inch tires. I will purchase this item again if additional tire storage space is needed, and have already recommended this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: baron-von-lederhosen

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Install was easy, it's holding a pretty big set of tires off one of my hot rods. Got it up in about 45 mins. Seems sturdy, I can hang from it. Need two more setups for some additional sets.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Tomkins

customer_reviews.title: Packaging issues, but prompt replacement of missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to store my winter/summer tires. Package arrived with water damage, and tons of excessive tape. When I got the box open, the bars that go across the side bars were missing. I contacted Hyloft on Monday and had my replacement parts on my porch by Friday. Installation was a snap, the construction quality is pretty good, rack seems very solid. All in all, I would order from Hyloft again. Can't really blame the company for shipping issues from the third party seller and they promptly sent me the replacement parts I required.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Does just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This tire rack does just what I expected - it allows me to keep an extra set of tires out of my way in my garage. The quality is excellent - very strong, easy to assemble/mount, etc, so I expect it to last for a very long time. I recently bought a set of winter tires for my wife's minivan, so I went out and bought another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: bnett

customer_reviews.title: Despite a picking error and not particularly fast shipping through ...
customer_reviews.text: Despite a picking error and not particularly fast shipping through Wayfair, this did the trick to get my spare set of wheels off the floor. But it takes up a lot more space than I though. I had to be creative on where to hang it so as not to be in the way.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, looks great, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and easy to install. Looks much better than some of the other options I have seen in person. If you're considering some of the other choices this one is well worth a few bucks more and it was Prime.
customer_reviews.author: BeHappy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great simple wall mounted tire rack. I have 2 rear drag pack now on the wall freezing up floor space
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Nice to get garage floor space back!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is nice! Gets the tires off the floor and out of the way. Sturdy and easy to install, I absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.author: R G

customer_reviews.title: We just had a earth quake in Alaska and I ...
customer_reviews.text: We just had a earth quake in Alaska and I have 22" rims on the rack a set of four and they. Didn't even move with the 7.0 quake.. This rack hands down paid for itself
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Received this Tire Rackin excellent shape, well packaged. Assembled easily with easy to follow instruction, and didn't have to modify any pieces to get them to fit! This is a heavy duty rack with a nice powder coat. What really impressed me (this may seem weird) was that the lag bolts for mounting the unit were also included, NICE!
customer_reviews.author: Will in the Bluegrass

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong tire rack
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for and more durable than I expected. Highly recommend this item for clearing up garage space.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne A. Nelson III

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well built
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much as advertised. Went together fairly easily (although I didn't pay enough attention to noticed the main bracket bolt holes were offset before I drilled the stud mount holes in-line). Fit four 275 section wheel/tire's with room for a 5th if I need it.
customer_reviews.author: E Burns

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, easy to install, easily hold four winter tires and rims
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid product, easy to mount and will easily hold a set of four tires. I didn't give it five stars since the packaging was somewhere between non-existent and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: Good tire rack
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up, used lags into CBS, allow about an hour to do this one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tire Rack
customer_reviews.text: After reading the other reviews, I purchased this rack and couldn't be happier. Installation was quite easy and I appreciate the suggestion of the other reviewer who indicated to perform the trial and error sizing while the unit was temporarily built on the ground instead of going up and down the ladder with the wheel multiple times. I also felt compelled to write a review as this is definitely a five star product - you can ignore the two one star reviews from people who don't understand that the rating system is of the product and not shipping problems,etc.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Tire holder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. If your ever in need of floor space because extra tires this thing does the job. Hold four snow tires off of my SUV. Easy to install. The only issue is lifting four big tire and wheels up into it. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very simple to install.
customer_reviews.text: The difficult part is making sure the first track is level. After that it is a breeze to put in. Very sturdy and durable. Like the fact that it is adjustable in width and even the tubes that go across can be re-positioned for different size tires.
customer_reviews.author: Mag108

customer_reviews.title: I like them a lot but sometimes the screw holes don't ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one. I like them a lot but sometimes the screw holes don't line up exactley 16 on center.
customer_reviews.author: salverez

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy, easy to install. In Colorado we often have two sets of tires for our cars that we change out seasonally, this gets them off my garage floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tire storage
customer_reviews.text: Use these to store second set of tires. We switch out summer and winter rims and tires depending on the season. Easily fixed to the garage wall. No issues with supplied screws. Holding fast.
customer_reviews.author: KountryKat

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for tire storage
customer_reviews.text: I have a supercharged 2007 Mustang GT that is drag raced in the summer months at our local dragstrips. I have a second set of wheels and tires specific to drag racing, and was getting really tired of them taking up floor space in my garage. Found this tire rack system first at a well known tire store's website, but then came to Amazon knowing I'd likely find it for a better price (which I did). Shipping was prompt, product was easy to install, and the spare set of wheels and tires are safe, secure, and neatly off the floor. Definitely a must-have solution for anyone with extra wheels & tires for their vehicle. Racing tires, winter tires, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Camp

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It is very well made, heavy duty, holds up to 400 lbs and very easy to install. About 1 hour install time from start to finish. Great for holding winter / summer tires. Highly recommended. Dan
customer_reviews.author: Dan L.

customer_reviews.title: more space
customer_reviews.text: Found the unit easy to assemble and mount , read complaints about instructions but did not see any problem after unpacking the unit . I got my tires up and out of the way, its a good looking unit
customer_reviews.author: John M. Praskey

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with package slightly damaged but the rack was not. Mounted it on the cinderblock wall. Holds 4 19" tires easily with 1-2 feet to spare. I would recommend the tire rack.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire storage rack but packaging not strong enough for delivery
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well finished and easy to install. I am very pleased with this rack. It took Amazon two attempts to get this to me though. The first rack arrived and e package was completely destroyed and the rack was damaged. Amazon replaced the rack immediately and I was delighted with the way their customer service team handle the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stageraider

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when promised. Hanging was simple and didn't take that long. The only problem was that the horizontal tubes were not threaded straight which made attachment to the end brackets with the bolts difficult. Once that was solved, the rack holds 4 very large wheels/tires perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: HyLoft 1000
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than anticipated - quality built. Easy to assemble, though the rear bar required some manipulation to get to the right position. Handled my 4 X5 Sport tires easily. Highly recommended!! Free shipping was a major plus!
customer_reviews.author: Princess Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - Came well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged - infact over packaged. Easy to assemble. Did a dry run on the floor and marked the location for the tire rods. All bolts and assembly hardware was correct and complete. If I need two, I would order a second.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Burg

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This tire rack has been really handy. It holds four of my track tires and two snow tires. I'm tempted to buy one more so I can get the rest of my tires off the floor. It looks nice and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Gave it to a friend for Christmas.  Was a little tough to install.
customer_reviews.text: My friend called me wondering if it was messed up. The support pieces would barely go into the wall mount. He whacked on it a few times and they eventually slipped in. He loves having his tires up off the floor of his garage.
customer_reviews.author: B Bailey

customer_reviews.title: great storage
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with moderate ability. Took me about 2 hours by myself start to finish. Holds a set of tires plus a bit more (couple trailer spares). Great way to get tires out of the way in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: domernuc

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy this years ago?
customer_reviews.text: Rock-solid rack for my tires, which have been taking up valuable garage space for years. Loses one star for being made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Pohl

customer_reviews.title: Yes I would recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded what I expected. I paid almost double for a similar item. Yes I would recommend this to everyone. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Greg in VA.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and even looks good
customer_reviews.text: Was everything that they advertised. Easy to install and even looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. I have had it installed for two ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I have had it installed for two years, and it is great. I was able to install it by myself, though it would have been easier with two.
customer_reviews.author: apro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tire storage solution
customer_reviews.text: I installed two of these in my garage and they work great. The rack is well built and has a lot of adjustment built in. These racks are best suited for tires under 33" in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Iager

customer_reviews.title: 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: you'll need 5 studs to do it takes about roughly 30 minutes; there are 3 steps and step 1 takes about 29 minutes. very sturdy and easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: tweeder82o

customer_reviews.title: Limited space and have an extra set of wheels?
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had this years ago when I sold my OEM set of wheels to gain space in my garage. Installation was easy and helped free up space. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Classified

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my need to get the track tires off the floor for storage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wish it would hold 2 more tires!
customer_reviews.text: it does what it's supposed to do and was quite easy to install. per the manufacturer it's rated for 400# and for someone with European cars that's more than adequate even for the winter tyres on steel wheels. My only complaint is the width limitation which restricts storing more than 6 wheel/tyres (at least in my case). If it would hold 2 more I could get everything off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Benz Lover

customer_reviews.title: We love this rack - it's everything we wanted
customer_reviews.text: WE wanted a way to store our winter tires, up and off of the floor. We wanted this rack to be well made, sturdy and good looking. This is all of those. It was easy to install because the directions were clear, our studs were on center. It holds all four of our winter tires and wheels plus 2 smaller travel tires and wheels. Our garage is roomy and tidy. We higly recommend the well made, well designed tire rack. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars even though packaging isnt the nest
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, the packaging leaves a little to be desired but everything came in good condition. Works perfect for me storing 4 19"wheels and tires. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Childs

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, keeps my snow or summer tires out of the way off season. Looks professional and feels solid. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Took 1/2 an hour for 1 person.
customer_reviews.author: Pin Ooi

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tire rack. It's just that simple. High quality, affordable, looks great. So much nicer than some 2x4's screwed together.
customer_reviews.author: Vaping.Jackass

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I can't remember the last time I bought stuff tha was so well built and engineered. Took 30 min to install.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Combs

customer_reviews.title: nice rack!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy with many stud anchor points. Easy quick access to my off season wheels while being out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: jgutz20

customer_reviews.title: Solid solution!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to free up some garage space and was pleasantly surprised at the end result. The unit was fairly easy to install and holds my 275/45/20 set without issue. Very good quality and design. One note of caution, measure the width of your tires side x side on the ground and set the width of the unit before loading. Otherwise you will be loading and unloading until the desired width is set. A real PITA if you mounted this very high like I did. The high mount worked so well I am going to purchase another unit and mount directly beneath this one. Overall this product is rock solid...do not hesitate to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S. Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Great design, well manufactured and very easy to install. Great organizer to get the tires stored and out of the way
customer_reviews.author: Sunfish

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Does just what it's supposed to. Well made, easy install. Great price. Hubby finally got my tires off the garage floor!
customer_reviews.author: Betty the Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, adjustable
customer_reviews.text: What I expected: a durable, adjustable tire rack. My tires are pretty wide/heavy (~70 lbs each), so I didn't want something flimsy. This worked as expected. Knocking off one star because the thread where one of the feet on the back screws in was a little messed up, so I had to clean it out with a tap. They should also have provided washers to go under the lag bolt that mount it. Screwing directly onto the painted rail made the paint flake.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good rack. Easy to assemble and is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: 1GKEK

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted - easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to purcahse a similar product from TireRack but that item was out of stock. The HyLoft model was available and was slightly cheaper with shipping included. Item arrived within three days and was installed in 30 minutes (from opening the box to on the wall). Very impressed with quality and ease of adjustability.
customer_reviews.author: Frisko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to clean up the garage and store tires
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these for my garage. They went together easily and are high quality. Its been a year since my purchase and they are still holing up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: This is my review name.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product. It's all solid metal. It can hold up to 8 normal size tires. The poles extend nicely if needed. I am only using it to hold 4 tires with rims right now. The product looks nice as well. You can tell it's one of those items you'll have for the next 20 years. Assemble was easy. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Nocera

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire Racks
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and hang on wall. Holds weight without sagging. Does need a hook welded on for a chain for security and prevent tires from flying off in an earthquake.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Tryhorn

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this wall mount tire rack, instlled and am very happy! Well built wall unit. Looks very nice. The package was a little rough, but it arrived with all the items needed to mount. I'm 100% happy with it. You will not be unhappy with this. The price and shipping can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Ron White

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected. Strong, easy to install and helped clear up much needed floor space. A must for any garage
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Pedrazoli

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This rack was very easy to install. The bumpers are quality and along with the adjustable bar at the rear, keep your wall well-protected from tire marring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tier rack
customer_reviews.text: Better than described easy to construct and install (20min.) high quality materials and finish. easy on the eyes easy on the wall. Too nice for most garages, makes you want to clean and shine your spares.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and strong!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to store my extra motorcycle wheels and tires and this was the way to go. Super strong, good looks and easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gann

product_meta.title: HyLoft 01000 Heavy Duty Adjustable Garage Wall Multi-Tire Rack Storage, Black
product_meta.description:
Style:HyloftThe HyLoft 58 in. W Heavy-Duty Adjustable TireLoft is the ultimate tire storage solution, combining durability with flexibility. Installation is quick and simple - the Master Rail attaches to wall studs on finished or unfinished walls, and support frames attach to the Master Rail. The TireLoft's unique design allows it to be adjusted from widths of 34 in. up to 58 in., even after installation. The telescoping chrome support bars adjust in width and depth, allowing the TireLoft to accommodate various tire sizes. Perfect for storing seasonal tires, RV tires, track-day tires, and ATV tires, the Heavy-Duty TireLoft will easily accommodate up to 4 standard vehicle tires. Made entirely of strong, durable steel with a black powder coat finish and chrome support tubes. Holds up to 400 lbs.

AMAZON.COM
The model 1000 HyLoft multi-tire rack storage system is a great solution for storing seasonal tires, recreational tires or track tires and wheels. The installation is simple. The black master rail attaches to the wall studs on finished or unfinished walls and the black rack clips in to the master rail. The multi-tire rack accommodates various tire sizes as the chrome telescoping support bars adjust in width and depth. The multi-tire rack is made entirely of strong durable steel. The load capacity is 400 lbs. HyLoft is an industry leader in garage storage offering unique, easy to use and versatile products to make the garage another fully accessible and organized space in your house. Add room with little investment.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The model 1000 HyLoft multi-tire rack storage system is a great solution for storing seasonal tires, recreational tires or track tires and wheels. The installation is simple. The black master rail attaches to the wall studs on finished or unfinished walls and the black rack clips in to the master rail. The multi-tire rack accommodates various tire sizes as the chrome telescoping support bars adjust in width and depth. The multi-tire rack is made entirely of strong durable steel. The load capacity is 400 lbs. HyLoft is an industry leader in garage storage offering unique, easy to use and versatile products to make the garage another fully accessible and organized space in your house. Add room with little investment.
